item.description:
Our first sushi dinner was a big success and a lot of fun!!

Please join me at Haru's for another great sushi dinner. I could only make a reservation for a total of 9 people and could only make it for this time. I think it is restaurant week and so reservations are being made well in advance. This restaurant is close to the Prudential mall. Take the T and get off at the prudential stop on the E line and it about a 5 minuet walk from their.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Another sushi dinner: Haru's in the Back Bay
